targets.query: SELECT success, error FROM (SELECT count("value") as success FROM "workflow_status" WHERE ("value" = 'success') AND "benchmark_uuid" =~ /$selected_benchmark_uuid/ AND "workflow_name" =~ /$selected_workflow_name/ AND "destination_name" =~ /$selected_destination_name/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "benchmark_uuid"), (SELECT count("value") as error FROM "workflow_status" WHERE ("value" = 'error')  AND "benchmark_uuid" =~ /$selected_benchmark_uuid/ AND "workflow_name" =~ /$selected_workflow_name/ AND "destination_name" =~ /$selected_destination_name/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "benchmark_uuid") GROUP BY benchmark_uuid

panels.title: Workflow Status

targets.query: SELECT value FROM /$selected_measurement/  WHERE ("benchmark_type" =  '<class \'benchmark.DestinationComparisonBenchmark\'>' AND "benchmark_uuid" =~ /$selected_benchmark_uuid/ AND "workflow_name" =~ /$selected_workflow_name/ AND "destination_name" =~ /$selected_destination_name/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY benchmark_uuid, destination_name, workflow_name

panels.title: Selected Measurements

targets.query: SELECT min("sum"), max("sum"), mean("sum"), stddev("sum") FROM (SELECT sum("value") FROM /$selected_measurement/ WHERE ("benchmark_type" =  '<class \'benchmark.DestinationComparisonBenchmark\'>' AND "benchmark_uuid" =~ /$selected_benchmark_uuid/ AND "workflow_name" =~ /$selected_workflow_name/ AND "destination_name" =~ /$selected_destination_name/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "destination_name", "workflow_name", "benchmark_uuid", "history_name") GROUP BY "benchmark_uuid", "destination_name", "workflow_name"

panels.title: Average over selected measurements
Custom Metrics
Runtime

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "runtime_seconds" WHERE ("benchmark_type" =  '<class \'benchmark.DestinationComparisonBenchmark\'>' AND "benchmark_uuid" =~ /$selected_benchmark_uuid/ AND "workflow_name" =~ /$selected_workflow_name/ AND "destination_name" =~ /$selected_destination_name/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "destination_name", "workflow_name", "benchmark_uuid", "history_name"

list.definition: SELECT workflow_name, value FROM "runtime_seconds" WHERE "benchmark_type" =  '<class \'benchmark.DestinationComparisonBenchmark\'>' GROUP BY workflow_name
list.label: Workflow
list.name: selected_workflow_name
list.query: SELECT workflow_name, value FROM "runtime_seconds" WHERE "benchmark_type" =  '<class \'benchmark.DestinationComparisonBenchmark\'>' GROUP BY workflow_name

list.definition: SELECT destination_name, value FROM "runtime_seconds" WHERE "benchmark_type" =  '<class \'benchmark.DestinationComparisonBenchmark\'>' GROUP BY destination_name
